base_description: Tall, yellow cylindrical object with simple design.
part_description: Composed of two cylindrical parts; a long, narrow upper section and a shorter, wider base.
internal_interaction_description: The upper cylindrical section fits into the wider base, allowing for structural stability. The parts are aligned vertically, with the base providing support to the taller section, ensuring the object remains upright.
external_interaction_description: This object can be used as a handle or support rod, interacting with external elements by providing grip or stability. It may connect with other objects or surfaces, allowing for manual manipulation or structural integration.
